SELECT DomainID AS "DomainID" , DomainCode AS "DomainCode" , DisplayName AS "DisplayName" , MultiDisplayName AS "MultiDisplayName" FROM SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN WHERE 1=1 AND IsUse = 'Y'
AND DomainCode = #{domainCode}

SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MULTICODENAME) AS "CodeName" , CODE AS "Code" FROM sys_base_code sbc WHERE BIZSECTION = 'System' AND CODEGROUP = 'PasswordPolicy' AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND DomainID = (SELECT NVL(MAX(DomainID), 0) FROM SYS_BASE_CODE WHERE BizSection = 'System' AND Code = sbc.Code AND CodeGroup = 'PasswordPolicy' AND DomainID = #{domainID}) ORDER BY SORTKEY

SELECT DOMAINID AS "DomainID" , ISUSECOMPLEXITY AS "IsUseComplexity" , MAXCHANGEDATE AS "MaxChangeDate" , MINIMUMLENGTH AS "MinimumLength" , CHANGENOTICEDATE AS "ChangeNoticeDate" , SpecialCharacterPolicy AS "SpecialCharacterPolicy" FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE DOMAINID IN (0, #{domainID}) AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY DOMAINID DESC

SELECT DOMAINID AS "DomainID" , ISUSECOMPLEXITY AS "IsUseComplexity" , MAXCHANGEDATE AS "MaxChangeDate" , MINIMUMLENGTH AS "MinimumLength" , CHANGENOTICEDATE AS "ChangeNoticeDate" , SpecialCharacterPolicy AS "SpecialCharacterPolicy" FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE 1=1 AND DOMAINID = #{domainID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE 1=1 AND DOMAINID = #{domainID}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO SYS_BASE_CONFIG a USING dual ON (a.SETTINGKEY = #{SettingKey} AND a.DOMAINID = #{domainID}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.SETTINGVALUE = #{SettingValue} , a.MODIFIERCODE = #{ModID} , a.MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (a.CONFIGID, a.BIZSECTION, a.DOMAINID, a.SETTINGKEY, a.SETTINGVALUE, a.ISCHECK, a.ISUSE, a.CONFIGTYPE, a.CONFIGNAME, a.DESCRIPTION, a.REGISTERCODE, a.REGISTDATE, a.MODIFIERCODE, a.MODIFYDATE) VALUES (SYS_BASE_CONFIG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'Admin',#{domainID},#{SettingKey},#{SettingValue},'Y','Y',#{ConfigType},#{ConfigName},#{Description},#{RegID},SYSDATE,#{ModID},SYSDATE)
